author: Scott Polacek
title: Bismack Biyombo Talks $1M COVID-19 Relief Donation, NBA Hiatus, More with B/R
description: "I'm going to come out of this quarantine looking like The Rock."     Charlotte Hornets  big man  Bismack Biyombo  provided a word of warning for his future opponents during an exclusive interview with Bleacher Report on Thursday...
content:
John Amis/Associated Press
"I'm going to come out of this quarantine looking like The Rock."
